title: 01 Person of Interest Intro Song / Theme by Ramin Djawadi
author: RU
comment: Best theme to one of the best series ever! :)
You'll never find us, but victim or perpetrator, if your number's up... we'll find you.
.. Prison Break Games of Thrones   and now Person of Interest..Ramin you have something god-gifted
description:
Most epic track of that fantastic Soundtrack, best song!
By the way, the Intro was composed by J.J. Abrahams, not Djawadi.  Buy on amazon:
http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00A...
